title: Update documentation for Embedding layer
body_html: The documentation corresponding torch.nn.Embedding mentions that Keep in mind that only a limited number of optimizers support sparse gradients: currently it’s optim.SGD (cuda and cpu), and optim.Adagrad (cpu). This is outdated and now SparseAdam is also supported.
body_text: The documentation corresponding torch.nn.Embedding mentions that Keep in mind that only a limited number of optimizers support sparse gradients: currently it’s optim.SGD (cuda and cpu), and optim.Adagrad (cpu). This is outdated and now SparseAdam is also supported.
body: The documentation corresponding [torch.nn.Embedding](http://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html) mentions that ```Keep in mind that only a limited number of optimizers support sparse gradients: currently it’s optim.SGD (cuda and cpu), and optim.Adagrad (cpu)```. This is outdated and now `SparseAdam` is also supported.
